= WindowState =
This action can modify different things on a window. It can maximize, minimize and restore a window, or switch between those states in different orders. It can also set and toggle the "always on top" property of a window. Select the window with the [docsActionsWindowFilter WindowFilter controls].

= Usage examples =
  * 7plus uses this to toggle always on top when the titlebar of a program was right-clicked.
  * It's also used in 7plus to maximize/restore/minimize the window under the mouse with ALT+MouseWheel.
